sentences.sContent: Small nodules form as the liver cells regenerate.
sentences.sCn: 肝细胞再生时会形成一些小结节。

sentences.sContent: ...it is because we have filled it with chemicals and undercut the ability of plants to regenerate it...

remMethod.val: re(重新)+generate(产生) → 重新产生 → (使)新生

words.tran: [生物][化学][物] 再生，重生；重建

trans.tranCn: 新生， 再生， 起革新作用
trans.tranOther: to grow again, or make something grow again
to grow again, or make something grow again
